headline: GTA Online Update
subtitle: Introducing the New Benefactor Glendale
content:
Known in the trade as a 'drug dealer’s car'. 1990s luxury German four door sedan turned 2010s roving depot for stepped-on cocaine. Expect to get stopped by the cops and stuck up by junkies.

Available for purchase now from SouthernSanAndreasSuperAutos.com and featured in the new 'I’m Not a Hipster' Race: 'Caffeine Rush'.
